author: ate
msg: there is no longer the need to hard code the OJB platform in the runtime configuration.
org.apache.jetspeed.test.database.ojb.platform, as well as the ant filtering of @platform@
tokens are now no longer needed.

author: ate
msg: Great patch provided by Michael Lipp, thank you!
This also removes the need to hard code the OJB platform in the runtime configuration.
I'll cleanout the no longer used org.apache.jetspeed.[test|production]database.ojb.platform
properties and the @platform@ filtering after this commit.
